channel.title: Running Client Error (I've had this error for a couple days...please help)
channel.description:
Here is the error I get everytime I run my Client: [IMG]http://i402.photobucket.com/albums/pp106/Dark___Soul/Random%20Logos/Problem.png[/img]
I can't fix it...people said I need to make a nullMaps folder and I've done that and put Mapconfig.txt into it but it still hasn't helped me at all =\ Please help me if you can, Thanks.

item.title: Running Client Error (I've had this error for a couple days...please help)
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

Look in the Java file that reads from that location then, it might be declared wrong.

Read full topic
